description:
Like a little mystery? Our Explore the Unknown Graphic on this short sleeve tee will show the world you mean it. And you’ll feel good while doing it, because the shirt is purpose-built for comfort: It’s made with flatlock seams, offset shoulder seams, and a blend of Merino wool and recycled polyester, which will give you moisture management, odor resistance, and fast dry times. The next time you’re ready to work up a sweat on a new (or favorite) hiking trail, this tee can be temperature-regulating companion.

Although this tee was built on our Men’s regular fit design block, it is intended to be a Unisex item. For Men, please order your regular size. For Women, we recommend to size down one size from your standard size. If you prefer an oversized look, then we would recommend ordering your standard Women’s size.
name: Smartwool Explore the Unknown Graphic SS Tee - Unisex
